Since Android 6.0, to scan low-power Bluetooth devices, applications need to have access to the device location. This is because Bluetooth beacons can be used to determine the location of mobile phones and users. However, this application does not use your location information. This permission is only for scanning Bluetooth devices. [Click to view the official Google documentation]

Since Android 6.0, to scan low-power Bluetooth devices, applications need to have access to the device location. This is because Bluetooth beacons can be used to determine the location of mobile phones and users. However, this application does not use your location information. This permission is only for scanning Bluetooth devices.
